title: Virt a Mate v1.71 The Virtual Reality Sex Simulation
description:
Our first project is Virt-A-Mate, an adults-only virtual reality sex simulator. The goal of this project was to make realistic characters using a combination of realistic joint physics, soft body physics, skin-accurate collisions, and advanced rendering techniques. The characters can come alive by capturing and storing motion capture from off-the-shelf VR controllers like the Vive controllers or Oculus Touch controllers. The characters can react to your movements or objects you control in a realistic manner. 

System Requirements:
--------------------
I5 Quad core or equivalent
4GB Ram
Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
Win 7 x64
Optional: HTV Vive or Oculus Rift
